Our first ever online video course is out now on SKILLSHARE!

Are you looking for your next big break? Whether you’ve NEVER had a big break in your creative career OR you’re a veteran creative who needs a new big break to reinvent yourself: this class is for you!!! Go to https://www.skillshare.com/r/profile/Andy-J.-Pizza/2832678 to get started!!!

 

PATREON + YOU!

itunes:title: 274 - Your Creative Center: How to Find It & Create From It with Johnny Pemberton
itunes:author: Alex Sugg, Johnny Pemberton, Yoni Wolf, Andy J. Pizza
itunes:summary:
For me, there is NOTHING more important to my creative journey than finding and staying in my creative center. Finding and creating from your creative center is about tuning into the pulse of your path.

There’s nothing worse than creating from a place that feels untethered and imbalanced. 

In this episode I chat with actor and comedian Johnny Pemberton about how to find your creative center and create from a place of personal taste and intuition.

This was such a good conversation!! So many great things came out of this chat for me!

We also talk about:
How to Find Your Center / Creating from that Centered Point
Mindset and Thought Experiment for Finding Who You Are As an Artist
How Your Taste Changes and What to Do About It
Why Not to Put a Hot Iron on Your Face!
AND MUCH MOOOOORREEE!!!

THIS EPISODE IS A PODSWAP! This conversation also appears on Johnny Pemberton’s podcast ‘Live to Tape’.
